channel.title: Help with putting my server online without hamachi and utorrent
channel.description: hi i edited my client and it saves... but when i get my brother or friends to join it says Error Connecting To Server everytime.. Please help Me add me on skype if u can help at Austin dusza or austin.dusza try both..

item.title: Help with putting my server online without hamachi and utorrent
item.dc:creator: @x_logan_x x logan x
item.description:
@x_logan_x wrote:

first go to start…then type in “cmd” then put ipconfig look at ur 1p4v adress i think thats it now once u no what ur ip4v adress is u going to ur internet and type it in the adress bar but on the fourh number example:000.000.000.(this one) put 1 the pass shud be admin and the user admin once thats done go to applactions and gameings…go to a free spot the port shud be 43594 protocool"tcp put ur server name for applaction!then put 43594 for then end same as the start!now ur going to put ur ip dress in and insted of putting that “1” i told u to put u gotta put ur real numbers that go there and it shud work!

Read full topic
item.source: Help with putting my server online without hamachi and utorrent
